channel.title: half life 1 crash on movement
channel.description: ok so today i went to play half life and i went to change my online player name soon as i hit the delete key the game just crashed so i tryed to go to the hazard course i press w and the game crashed any fix my computer can run half just fine

item.title: half life 1 crash on movement
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I’m glad your problem got fixed, but it would be useful to post which settings you had to change in Windows 8 to make the game work, just in case other people with the same problem find this thread in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: half life 1 crash on movement
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
lightninrod4:

my computer can run half just fine

how stupid do you think we are? If your computer was made any time after 1998, it can, in fact, run HL just fine

Anyway, I recommend you download virtualbox, install windows XP on it and run HL on that.

Read full topic

item.title: half life 1 crash on movement
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I think you’ve made more problem threads in your few months here than anyone else in their years here.

Anyway, have you tried the obvious reinstall? Deleting your config.cfg? Verifying your cache?

Read full topic
